message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.PL, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of goal recognition, which is a key problem in both cooperative and competitive agent interactions. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The paper also leverages advances in operator-counting heuristics computed using linear programs over constraints derived from classical planning problems, which suggests that it may also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG), Robotics (cs.RO), and Programming Languages (cs.PL) sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with the problem of efficiently inferring the correct goal, which suggests that it may also belong to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
